Show:

File: class/style.js

var gulp = require('gulp');
var config = require('../config');
var buildHelper = require('../helpers/build-helper');
var handleErrors = require('../utils/handle-error');
var $ = require('gulp-load-plugins')({
    camelize: true
});
var minifyCSS = require('gulp-minify-css');
var stripComments = require('gulp-strip-comments');

var base = {
    init: function () {
        return new Style(this);
    }
};

/**
 * Style
 * @param context
 * @constructor
 */
var Style = function (context) {
    /**
     * context
     * @type {Element}
     * @private
     */
    this.context = context;
    this._init();
};

/**
 * constructor
 * @private
 */
Style.prototype._init = function () {

};

/**
 * process file css
 * @public
 */
Style.prototype.process = function (source, base, dest) {
    var $return = gulp.src(source, {base: base})
        .pipe( $.plumber( {errorHandler: handleErrors } ) )
        .pipe( $.sourcemaps.init() )
        .pipe( $.sass(config.libs.sass ) )
        .pipe( $.importCss() )
        .pipe( $.autoprefixer(config.libs.autoPrefixer ) );

    if( buildHelper.isRelease() ){
        $return.pipe(stripComments())
            .pipe( minifyCSS() )
            .pipe($.sourcemaps.write('./'))
            .pipe( gulp.dest( dest ) );
    }

    return $return.pipe( gulp.dest( dest ) );
};

module.exports = base;
